mapper.select: SELECT db.id, db.name, db.uname, db.upwd, db.url, db.driver_class_name, db.driver_file_id, db.database_type, db.database_file_id, db.add_time, db.comment FROM view_field v JOIN view_path_header h ON v.id = h.view_id JOIN data_table_info dt ON h.table_id = dt.id JOIN database_info db ON dt.db_id = db.id WHERE v.id = #{id}
